mapper.select: select a.accommo_no as no, a.host_no as hostNo, a.accommo_name as accommoName, r.room_no as roomNo, r.room_name as roomName, r.standard_number as standardNumber, r.maximum_number as maximumNumber from tb_final_accommodations a, tb_final_rooms r where a.accommo_no = r.accommo_no and a.accommo_no = #{accommoNo} and r.room_no = #{roomNo}
